lead_paragraph: The new owners of the South Beach mansion where Gianni Versace lived and died said Tuesday that they hope to use the Italian fashion designer's name and legacy in rebranding the property as a hotel.

headline.main: Firm With Jordache Tie Top Bidder for Versace Home
headline.print_headline: Firm With Jordache Tie Top Bidder for Versace Home
